document.full_text: honda's marco simoncelli grabbed his first motogp pole position for the catalunya grand prix in front of a hostile crowd on saturday, beating casey stoner and jorge lorenzo to first place.
document.title: simoncelli takes pole to angry whistles
lines_and_colors: honda's marco simoncelli grabbed his first motogp pole position for the catalunya grand prix in front of a hostile crowd on saturday, beating casey stoner and jorge lorenzo to first place.
